name: Zombie Sniper Shoot-Commando Front Call of Zombies
name_original: Zombie Sniper Shoot-Commando Front Call of Zombies
description:
The recent chemical war between 2 giants of the world has become a cause of imminent destruction for all, as a threatening virus is spreading. The unknown virus, is the most vicious known virus till date, which neither kills nor cures, it makes people want to kill.
The infected are largely at lose, become aggressive and out of control and the lives of all the innocent people in the country are at stake. Shanarago, a trained military assassin, gets called in to eliminate every possible infected, without losing many innocent lives. He is the only one capable of achieving the mission, but if he can’t, the government will have to initiate a nuke wipe out strike on the country as the last resort.


FEATURES

- Intense action based free roam FPS shooter
- Unique concept of shooting against a virus infected onslaught
- Wield 2 weapons at the same time, with numerous weapons to be earned
- Survive 5 rounds of shooting madness against an out of control infected crowd


WIELD 2 WEAPONS
Use numerous types of short and long range weapons against the infected and carry 2 weapons at the same time for maximum damage.

INTENSE SURVIVAL ACTION
Survival becomes mandatory as no place is safe in the infected empires, the infected can pounce from any side challenging the fastest of reflexes.
